name: Hollow Knight: Gods & Glory
summary: Gods & Glory is the last of the three planned free content packs for Hollow Knight, following The Grimm Troupe on 26 October, 2017. It was announced on 31 January, 2018, and is planned to be released on PC and Switch on 23 August, 2018. Footage of the expansion was featured in the E3 2018 Switch Release Trailer , with further gameplay being showcased at the Nintendo Treehouse Live Event.
